attr.title: Fool's End
attr.desc:
Fool's End is a fast-paced single-player mining game. Dig and destroy everything in your path, outsmart monsters and mine your path to complete each level. There's always another way to escape...  
**Note:This port includes a demo. Purchase on steam for the full game!**
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on steam.  
Open up the steam console by typing 'steam://open/console' into a web browser.  
 Enter the following command: `download_depot 2636260 2636261 548360717410745371`.  
 Place the contents of depot_2636261 folder into foolsend/assets.
attr.inst_md:
1. Purchase the game on [steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2636260/Fools_End/).  
2. Open up the steam console by typing 'steam://open/console' into a web browser.  
3. Enter the following command: 'download_depot 2636260 2636261 548360717410745371`.  
4. Place the contents of depot_2636261 folder into foolsend/assets.
